front.title: Network-based mobility management in Dyncast network environment

abstract.t: Dynamic anycast (Dyncast) network architecture is to choose the best edge computing server by considering both the network environment and available computing/storage resources of the edge computing server. This draft describes the mechanism in which service continuity is provided even when the client moves and connects to a new ingress Dyncast anycast Node (DAN) by using the PMIPv6-based mobility management method in the Dyncast-based edge computing networking environment.
